    • Constructor Detail

      • Party

        public Party(Deck deck)
      throws EmptyQuestionsListException,
             DeckUnderFilledException,
             NotEnoughQuestionsException
        Constructor of Party class. The param "chosenQuestions" gets instantiated as an empty ArrayList. Gets Party.NB_STEPS_BY_ROUND questions for each Round and then sort is by Round order.
        Parameters:
        deck - A Deck that contains at least 15 questions, including 5 for each Round parameter.
        Throws:
        QuestionsListIsEmptyException - occurs when the list of questions from Deck is empty.
        DeckUnderFilledException - occurs when there's not enough questions to fit the requirement of Party.NB_STEPS for the Party.
        NotEnoughQuestionsException - occurs when a Round has less questions than Party.NB_STEPS_BY_ROUND asks it to have.
        NotEnoughQuestionsException - occurs when a Round has more questions than Party.NB_STEPS_BY_ROUND asks it to have.
        EmptyQuestionsListException

        Throws:
